website_summaries.verdict: This Modway patio chair mixes comfort with strong, built to last materials. Your biggest problem will be trying to decide who gets to sit in it first.
pros: Made with a sturdy, strong build – this chair is built to last
The round shape of this chair is ideal for tucking your feet in
The base of the chair comes with rubber protectors, so no need to worry about scratching your hardwood floors
cons: Higher price point than its competitors

customer_reviews.title: We love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair! Everyone who has sat in it so far--male or female, different heights & weights--has found it extremely comfortable. We have trouble taking turns because everyone wants to use it all the time. We will be ordering another! Assembly was easy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well designed and comfortable. We are using it in the house with ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well designed and comfortable. We are using it in the house with hardwood floors and I love that it is both functional and aesthetically beautiful - like an art piece. I was planning on putting a rug with padding to protect the hardwood but saw that the base has small rubber nubs, so instead, I added felt padding to protect the floors. Seems to hold up well and not seeing any scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: My chair was delivered damaged. Once I was able to contact the seller - they quickly took care of my issue and sent me a new chair and I had it within a week! I love this chair! It is amazing! I was worried about spending this kind of money on a outside chair. I love sitting in the sun and reading! It is very relaxing! Life is short - give yourself a gift!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: my new favorite place for coffee
customer_reviews.text: the delivery service was great. the packaging super good. one, unskilled person can assemble it . Best part- the chair is wonderful. plan ahead though....it comes on a big pallet that you'll need to dispose of.
customer_reviews.author: Louise W.

customer_reviews.title: The seller was easy to work with and saved me a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a small dent on the medal top. The seller was easy to work with and saved me a lot of stress. If anyone is thinking of buying this product, don’t loose sleep over it, just buy it! Best quality ever! Love our outdoor egg swing. It’s a show stopper. Kiddos love it and we as parents love it too.
customer_reviews.author: mai

customer_reviews.title: Love my chair!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair. I received it faster than scheduled, which was a really nice treat. It's super comfortable and I look forward to sitting in it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Classie Pierre

customer_reviews.title: And now we have two
customer_reviews.text: After visiting a winery we decided to try a chair like these for our back garden. Desired to have a one piece chair to avoid the “seams” used to halve other similar type chairs. Wanted a sturdy frame and finish that would last well out in the sun. Very much like the construction and finish of these chairs. The packaging was very good - maybe too good? Tools some effort to unpack. :) Assembly was straight forward (simple) and all tools included. Very comfortable we love these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am not using the stand -- instead, I bought a tree swing hanging strap and am using that to hang it from a tree in my backyard. It's beautiful and very comfortable. I generally leave the cushion in my shed so I don't have to worry about it getting rained on or bleached by the sun, but it's easy to move and tie back into the seat. It looks very nice in my backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E. Wiggin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived much earlier than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal from Amazon Prime for this swing chair. Delivery was painless and it arrived 2 weeks ahead of schedule. Chair is well made and very comfortable. There’s no missing hardware and assembly took literally 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: KHKL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, perfect chair for someone 5'2". My favorite part of the day is coming home, curling up and reading in my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A

customer_reviews.title: Fairytale comes true!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for indoor usage and my kids love it. They eat snacks, watch tv and play rocket space-ship with it! My husband who is very picky also is enjoying our purchase on a daily basis. Overall there is a fight on who gets to sit on it and sometimes the 3 of them squeeze in easily! This is a unique but fun swing for the corner of the room and can also be used for nursing and soothing your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly patio seating
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable patio chair I have ever owned. Will buy another when they are back in stock
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Well, actually my friend loves it. She invites people in just to sit in the chair. It is sturdy, fun and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: We love these chairs so much!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are high quality, very sturdy and SO comfortable. They were delivered carefully packaged on pallets and we put them together in no time. I don't know where they have been all my life! They look great in our yard and, with a stand propane heater between them, we are cozy even on chilly nights.
customer_reviews.author: tiffnmike

customer_reviews.title: We love this item
customer_reviews.text: We love this item. It is just as described, sturdy, attractive and comfortable. I can’t say enough about this seller who was so helpful and willing to accommodate us after a miscommunication in delivery location!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT! We already had one and bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT PRODUCT! We already had one and bought a second one. Very Comfortable and durable. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it, arrived exactly when scheduled and was packed securely, no damage upon arrival. The chair is super comfy and soothing, lulls you to sleep when you sit in it. Very easy to assemble and looks good. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanna Khalus

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I picked this out as a birthday present to me from my husband. I love it!!! It was delivered to my backyard by delivery men. They were very kind and helpful. The chair is extremely comfortable and I have been in it almost everyday since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: I’m sold!
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely in love with my new best friend. I always wanted one of this chairs and finally have enough space to fit it in my new home. I recommend it to anyone who is on the market to get one! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Violetta Kowszik

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic chair and so easy to assemble. It took 5 minutes, it took longer to unwrap it than put it together. The seller was very responsive when I couldn’t track it on Amazon. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: clare

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy! Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair, but the base junction is not strong. I am 110 lbs. and the frame creaks with each soft sway of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair is beautiful and very comfortable. The way it was packed was amazing. The delivery was great. I will buy again fromthis company.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and seller was awesome. Called me to follow up and made sure it arrived as expected. This is a great chair, comfy, super easy to Assemble and very cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chair ever
customer_reviews.text: I loved this chair so much I bought two of them. It's super easy to put together, sturdy, and sooo comfortable you will not regret this purchase. All my guests have wanted one after I got it. Highly recommend! I bought the navy color cushion and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa James

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Loved this chair did take a bit to arrive but with this pandemic going on I understand. It was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: awesome product however the shipping took for ever and the shipping company was very hard and difficult to work with
customer_reviews.author: Frank J Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable egg shaped swing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for outdoor patio. Looks great and is very comfortable to sit in . Assembly nearly took any time. It was packaged and delivered very carefully
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! Have it sitting in the living room I love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it is great to relax in
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Favorite chair
customer_reviews.text: Everybody love this chair. Bought one almost 3 years ago and buying second one now.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it is described as, loving it so far. The only downside is the price on Amazon. Shop around if you can plan ahead or wait few weeks and you can save $100 easily.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, poor delivery
customer_reviews.text: The item is fantastic. The only issue is that it arrived about 10 days later than expected at 11 pm!
customer_reviews.author: acmepackers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The minute you sit in the chair you go straight into relax mode !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to assemble. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great, love to relax in it in our sunny ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, love to relax in it in our sunny Las Vegas yard. Delivery was great the driver put the pallet in may garage. It took more time to unwrap the chair from the pallet than it did to take it into the yard and assemble it. Very durable construction and very very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas Lounger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite place to sit (unfortunately it's my friends as well). :) Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pad was broken when it was arrived, where to get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Xin

customer_reviews.title: It would have been 5 stars, reason for the ...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been 5 stars, reason for the missing stars is because of the stand, very low stand and not built for silent swinging. connections and joints make noise and due to low profile it does not allow us to actually swing as the swing hits the stand
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great chair!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with this chair. It was delivered in great hands and on time. All items included in this [large] package were wrapped carefully to protect the merchandise. The frame is sturdy, the chair structure is well made, and the cushion is large and comfy. We are happy all the way around. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Kim Zuro

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just felt in love in this chair!!! It is still cold (early spring) but I am already using it in my patio. I enjoy stting in it, read book and have my morning coffee. It is a way better than any hammock or a beach chair or a patio bed/chair!!!!! I very highly recommned. Especially at this great price. It is a steal!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: The description is miss leading. The chair has an ...
customer_reviews.text: The description is miss leading. The chair has an aluminum frame, however the base and suspension pole are steel, Near the ocean, expect a life span of 8 months before rust sets in. When the magnet reached out and "grabbed" the base/pole, I knew I had been had......Amazon saved the day with a prompt return.
customer_reviews.author: T. Flemma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect little nest for my daughter to perch in in the summer!
customer_reviews.author: lw

customer_reviews.title: Even the kids love sitting and reading in it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife and she absolutely loves it. She loves it so much that she doesn't want to get out of it! All joking aside, the chair is made with quality materials and the craftsmanship is A+. We have not noticed a single flaw (besides being to comfortable). Even the kids love sitting and reading in it. Just an FYI, the packaging is BIG. It comes on a pallet and is about 4' tall with each piece being individually wrapped so be prepared to receive it. If we ever need another swinging chair I will definitely order another one of these!
customer_reviews.author: JWT

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it. Wrong, wrong, wrong
customer_reviews.text: Received the wrong item. Wrong color (white) and style wicker, wrong color (blue) cushion. It didn't even come with base. It came with two of the upright armatures. It didn't come with a base. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: OkieDoc

product_meta.title: Modway EEI-739-NAV-SET Encase Wicker Rattan Outdoor Patio Porch Lounge Egg, Swing Chair with Stand, Navy
product_meta.description: Color:NavyEmbark on moments of metamorphosis and rebirth with an exotic hanging outdoor swing chair. Transform the mundane to heightened states of consciousness with Encase Outdoor Swing Chair. This hanging swing chair is comprised of a sturdy espresso metal stand and rattan seat. Surround yourself with plush fabric cushions to complete entry into a relaxed state in the Encase Hanging Chair.
feature_bullets: Patio refresh - escape to peaceful serenity in your own backyard with an inviting Wicker patio Swing. Accommodate the needs of your outdoor space with a modern hanging chair perfect for relaxing
Outdoor Swing - featuring a sturdy powder-coated Steel frame, The seat of this outdoor patio Swing Chair is woven with luxurious Synthetic Rattan creating a stylish and supportive place to rest
Contemporary style - woven texture, gentle curves, and organic appeal enhance the modern look of this outdoor Swing. Its egg shape makes it an eye-catching addition by the pool or inside the home
Stylish lounge spot - enjoy sunshine and warm weather in this outdoor Swing chair. The all-weather cushion wears a machine-washable cover that's both water and fade resistant granting lasting comfort

Stand-alone Swing measurements - perfect for the porch or poolside, The trendy Swing comes equipped with a sturdy Steel stand and hanging Chain. Dimensions: 43. 5"L x 40"W x 71"H; Weight limit: 265 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
